sentence.Network_en: The company's salesman has been caroling its glories for many years.
sentence.Network_cn: 公司的推销员多少年来都在歌颂公司的辉煌成就.

sentence.Network_en: One of the glories of the island has always been its bird population.
sentence.Network_cn: 鸟儿的数量一直是该岛的一大骄傲。

sentence.Network_en: The album sees them re-living past glories but not really breaking any new ground.
sentence.Network_cn: 这张专辑使他们重温了昔日的辉煌，但实际上没有任何新的突破。

entry.def: Glory is the fame and admiration that you gain by doing something impressive.

example.ex: Walsham had his moment of glory when he won a 20km race.
example.tran: 沃尔沙姆夺得20公里比赛冠军的那一刻无比荣耀。

example.ex: ...we were still basking in the glory of our Championship win.
example.tran: 我们依然沉浸在夺得锦标赛冠军的荣耀中。

entry.def: A person's  glories are the occasions when they have done something people greatly admire which makes them famous.

example.ex: The album sees them reliving past glories but not really breaking any new ground.
example.tran: 这张专辑使他们重温了昔日的辉煌，但实际上没有任何新的突破。

example.ex: ...the military glories of Frederick the Great.
example.tran: 腓特烈大帝军事上的巅峰时刻

entry.def: The glory of something is its great beauty or impressive nature.

example.ex: The glory of the idea blossomed in his mind.
example.tran: 在他的脑海中这一想法变得越来越宏大。

entry.def: The glories of a culture or place are the things that people admire most about it.

example.ex: ...a tour of Florence, to enjoy the artistic glories of the Italian Renaissance...
example.tran: 领略意大利文艺复兴时期伟大艺术成就的佛罗伦萨之旅

example.ex: One of the glories of the island has always been its bird population.
example.tran: 鸟儿的数量一直是该岛的一大骄傲。

entry.def: If you glory in a situation or activity, you enjoy it very much.

example.ex: The workers were glorying in their new-found freedom...
example.tran: 工人们因才获得的自由而无比喜悦。

example.ex: He does not glory in his past successes and looks forward to achieving more.
example.tran: 他没有陶醉于过去的成功，而是期望取得更大的成就。

entry.def: If you go out in a blaze of glory, you do something very dramatic at the end of your career or your life which makes you famous.

example.ex: I am never going back to prison. I am going to make national news headlines and go out in a blaze of glory.
example.tran: 我将永远告别监狱，我会成为全国报纸的头条新闻，从此扬名天下。

auth_sentence.content: March captures both the uncertainties and glories of this method beautifully.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: March captures both the uncertainties and glories of this method beautifully.
